# JRaviLab {.unnumbered}

This is a short book compiled to guide, onboard, and offboard JRaviLab members at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.

### Acknowledgments

We appreciate and build upon awesome onboarding group resources from Arjun Krishnan, Fan Zhang, Casey Greene, Annika Barber, Christoph Rau, Jeff Leek, and several others.

✍️ _If you'd like to edit/update/contribute to this short e-book, please [email me](mailto:janani.ravi@cuanschutz.edu) or add a pull request to the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/JRaviLab/lab_setup) directly.
